功能描述_en:
Enable the communication module's serial port multiplexing function.
Based on a physical communication serial port, virtualize two or even more serial ports through a standardized protocol, generally virtualizing three serial ports, one for external protocol stack dial-up internet access, and the other two for sending and receiving AT commands. It is recommended to use AT+CMUX=0 to enable the serial port multiplexing function.
Command Format
参数_en:
- `<mode>`: Integer type, mode under MUX open state, at least basic mode needs to be supported in this specification
0: Basic mode (default value)
1: Enhanced mode (currently not supported)
  - `0`: Basic mode (default value)
  - `1`: Enhanced mode (currently not supported)

- `<subset>`: Integer type, frame format subset
0: UIH frames used only (default value)
1: UI frames used only (currently not supported)
2: Currently not supported
  - `0`: UIH frames used only (default value)
  - `1`: UI frames used only (currently not supported)
  - `2`: Currently not supported

- `<port_speed>`: Integer type, serial port speed
1: 9600bit/s
2: 19200bit/s
3: 38400bit/s
4: 57600bit/s
5: 115200bit/s (default value)
6: 230400bit/s
7: Currently not supported
8: Currently not supported
  - `1`: 9600bit/s
  - `2`: 19200bit/s
  - `3`: 38400bit/s
  - `4`: 57600bit/s
  - `5`: 115200bit/s (default value)
  - `6`: 230400bit/s
  - `7`: Currently not supported
  - `8`: Currently not supported

- `<N1>`: Integer type, maximum frame length, 1~32768; currently only supports the setting range of 1~2048
Default value in basic mode is 31
Default value in enhanced mode is 64

- `<T1>`: Integer type, receive confirmation timer, 1~255, 1 represents 10ms, default value is 10 (100ms)

- `<N2>`: Integer type, maximum reconnection times, 0~100, default value is 3, currently only supports 0~5

- `<T2>`: Integer type, multiplex control channel response timer, 2~255, 2 represents 20ms, default value is 30 (300ms)

- `<T3>`: Integer type, wake-up response timer, 1~255, 1 represents 1s, default value is 10 (10s)
(Currently does not support this parameter, returns 0 value when reading the command)

- `<k>`: Integer type, window size, 1~7, default value is 2, used to support error recovery in enhanced mode.

功能描述:
设置GPRS的PDP（Packet Data Protocol,分组数据协议）格式。APN允许设置的长度最长是50。
命令格式
参数:
- `<cid>`：(PDP Context Identifier)一个数字参数，指定一个PDP上下文定义，这个参数是当地的TE-MT接口并且被应用到其他PDP上下文相关的命令当中，使用查询命令可以查询到允许的值(最小值为1)。
  - `(PDP`: Context Identifier)一个数字参数
  - `这个参数是当地的TE`: MT接口并且被应用到其他PDP上下文相关的命令当中

- `<PDP_type>`：(Packet Data Protocol type)字符串参数，用于指定分组数据协议的类型
“IP”网络协议（Internet Protocol）（IETFSTD 5）
  - `(Packet`: Data Protocol type)字符串参数
  - `“IP”网络协议（Internet`: Protocol）（IETFSTD 5）

- `<APN>`：(Access Point Name)字符串形式，是一个逻辑名称，用来选择GGSN或者外部分组数据网。
  - `(Access`: Point Name)字符串形式

- `<PDP_address>`：字符串形式，用来在地址空间中区分MT。
如果不写这个参数，则在PDP的启动过程当中由TE提供这个值。
如果TE提供失败，就请求动态地址，即使在PDP的启动过程当中分配了地址，在使用这条指令查询的时候仍然会返回空。

- `<d_comp>`：数字参数用来控制PDP数据压缩（仅适用于SNDCP）
0 - off (缺省情况下默认值)
  - `0`: off (缺省情况下默认值)

- `<h_comp>`：数字参数用来控制PDP头部压缩0 - off (缺省情况下默认值)
  - `数字参数用来控制PDP头部压缩0`: off (缺省情况下默认值)

- `<pd1>, … <pdN>`：0到N，字符串类型，意义与<PDP_type>有关
功能描述_en:
Set the PDP (Packet Data Protocol) format for GPRS. The maximum length allowed for APN is 50.
Command Format
参数_en:
- `<cid>`: (PDP Context Identifier) a numeric parameter that specifies a PDP context definition, this parameter is local to the TE-MT interface and is applied to other PDP context-related commands, allowed values can be queried using the query command (minimum value is 1).
  - `(PDP`: Context Identifier) a numeric parameter
  - `this parameter is local to the TE`: MT interface and is applied to other PDP context-related commands

- `<PDP_type>`: (Packet Data Protocol type) string parameter used to specify the type of packet data protocol
"IP" network protocol (Internet Protocol) (IETFSTD 5)
  - `(Packet`: Data Protocol type) string parameter
  - `"IP" network protocol (Internet`: Protocol) (IETFSTD 5)

- `<APN>`: (Access Point Name) in string form, is a logical name used to select GGSN or external packet data networks.
  - `(Access`: Point Name) in string form

- `<PDP_address>`: in string form, used to distinguish MT in the address space.
If this parameter is not provided, the value will be provided by TE during the PDP startup process.
If TE fails to provide it, a dynamic address will be requested, even if an address was allocated during the PDP startup process, it will still return empty when querying with this command.

- `<d_comp>`: numeric parameter used to control PDP data compression (only applicable to SNDCP)
0 - off (default value)
  - `0`: off (default value)

- `<h_comp>`: numeric parameter used to control PDP header compression 0 - off (default value)
  - `numeric parameter used to control PDP header compression 0`: off (default value)

- `<pd1>, … <pdN>`: 0 to N, string type, related to the meaning of <PDP_type>

功能描述:

命令格式
参数:
- `<mode>`：设置收到短信后向用户发送的指示方式。
0：短信指示代码在模组中缓存,如果TA已满，代码可存贮在其它地方或者将最旧的代码丢弃，并用最新接收到的代码去替代。
1：当On-line State时，舍弃保存的短信指示代码并拒绝新的指示代码，其它情况下，直接将代码显示在终端设备上。
2：当模组在On-line State时，短信指示代码在模组中缓存，当连接释放后，将短信指示代码通过串口输出，在其他state下，直接将代码显示在终端设备上。
3：当模组在On-line State时，短信指示代码和其它数据一起传输，代码显示在终端设备上。
  - `0`: 短信指示代码在模组中缓存
  - `1`: 当On-line State时
  - `2`: 当模组在On-line State时
  - `3`: 当模组在On-line State时

- `<mt>`：设置新短信指示代码的格式，默认值为0
0：不向终端发送新短信指示代码。
1：新短信指示代码格式为+CMTI: "MT",<index>，短信内容存贮而不直接显示。
2：新短信指示代码格式为+CMT: <oa>,<scts>,<tooa>,<lang>,<encod>,<priority>
[,<cbn>],<length><CR><LF><CR><LF><data>(文本模式)，短信内容直接显示而不存贮。
3：使用<mt>=2所定义的主动上报代码直接将短信指示代码传送到终端设备，其它模式的信息指示代码和<mt>=1相同。
  - `0`: 不向终端发送新短信指示代码。
  - `1`: 新短信指示代码格式为+CMTI: "MT"
  - `2`: 新短信指示代码格式为+CMT: <oa>
  - `3`: 使用<mt>=2所定义的主动上报代码直接将短信指示代码传送到终端设备

- `<bm>`：设置新小区广播指示代码的格式，默认值为1。
0：不发送新小区广播的指示信息，小区广播也不会存贮
2：新小区广播指示代码格式为+CBM: <oa>,[<alpha>,]<scts>[,<tooa>,<length>]
<CR><LF><data>(文本模式),小区广播内容直接显示而不存贮。
  - `0`: 不发送新小区广播的指示信息
  - `2`: 新小区广播指示代码格式为+CBM: <oa>

- `<ds>`：短信发送的状态报告，默认值为1。
0：无短信发送状态报告
1：短信发送状态报告代码格式为+CDS: <fo>,<mr>,[<ra>],[<tora>],<scts>,
<dt>,<st>(文本模式)
  - `0`: 无短信发送状态报告
  - `1`: 短信发送状态报告代码格式为+CDS: <fo>

- `<bfr>`：默认值为 0。
0：当<mode>设为1、2时，存贮在TA中的该指令定义的代码将会被发送到TE，模组在传送代码之前，会先返回"OK"。
1：当<mode>设为1、2时，存贮在TA中的该指令定义的代码将会被清除。
  - `默认值为`: 0。
  - `0`: 当<mode>设为1、2时
  - `1`: 当<mode>设为1、2时
功能描述_en:
Set how the module notifies the user after receiving a short message from the network.
Command Format
参数_en:
- `<mode>`: Set the indication method sent to the user after receiving an SMS.
0: SMS indication codes are cached in the module; if the TA is full, codes can be stored elsewhere or the oldest code can be discarded and replaced with the latest received code.
1: When in On-line State, discard the saved SMS indication codes and reject new indication codes; otherwise, directly display the codes on the terminal device.
2: When the module is in On-line State, SMS indication codes are cached in the module; after the connection is released, the SMS indication codes are output through the serial port; in other states, directly display the codes on the terminal device.
3: When the module is in On-line State, SMS indication codes are transmitted along with other data, and the codes are displayed on the terminal device.
  - `0`: SMS indication codes are cached in the module
  - `1`: When in On-line State
  - `2`: When the module is in On-line State
  - `3`: When the module is in On-line State

- `<mt>`: Set the format of the new SMS indication code, default value is 0
0: Do not send new SMS indication codes to the terminal.
1: New SMS indication code format is +CMTI: "MT",<index>, SMS content is stored but not directly displayed.
2: New SMS indication code format is +CMT: <oa>,<scts>,<tooa>,<lang>,<encod>,<priority>
[,<cbn>],<length><CR><LF><CR><LF><data> (text mode), SMS content is directly displayed but not stored.
3: Use the active reporting code defined by <mt>=2 to directly send the SMS indication code to the terminal device; other modes have the same indication code as <mt>=1.
  - `0`: Do not send new SMS indication codes to the terminal.
  - `1`: New SMS indication code format is +CMTI: "MT"
  - `2`: New SMS indication code format is +CMT: <oa>
  - `3`: Use the active reporting code defined by <mt>=2 to directly send the SMS indication code to the terminal device

- `<bm>`: Set the format of the new cell broadcast indication code, default value is 1.
0: Do not send new cell broadcast indication information; cell broadcast will not be stored.
2: New cell broadcast indication code format is +CBM: <oa>,[<alpha>,]<scts>[,<tooa>,<length>]
<CR><LF><data> (text mode), cell broadcast content is directly displayed but not stored.
  - `0`: Do not send new cell broadcast indication information
  - `2`: New cell broadcast indication code format is +CBM: <oa>

- `<ds>`: SMS sending status report, default value is 1.
0: No SMS sending status report
1: SMS sending status report code format is +CDS: <fo>,<mr>,[<ra>],[<tora>],<scts>,
<dt>,<st> (text mode)
  - `0`: No SMS sending status report
  - `1`: SMS sending status report code format is +CDS: <fo>

- `<bfr>`: Default value is 0.
0: When <mode> is set to 1 or 2, the codes defined by this command stored in the TA will be sent to the TE, and the module will return "OK" before sending the codes.
1: When <mode> is set to 1 or 2, the codes defined by this command stored in the TA will be cleared.
  - `Default value is`: 0.
  - `0`: When <mode> is set to 1 or 2
  - `1`: When <mode> is set to 1 or 2
